sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' const AddUserForm = (props) => { const initialFormState = { category: '', price: '', stocked: '', name: ''} const [user, setUser] = useState(initialFormState) const handleInputChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target setUser({ ...user, [name]: value }) } return (
{ event.preventDefault() if (!user.category || !user.price || !user.stocked || !user.name) return props.addUser(user) setUser(initialFormState) }} >

) } export default AddUserForm
